SalesTrxnItemRelationShape.name: SalesTrxnItemRelationShape
SalesTrxnItemRelationShape.description: Describes the relationship between sales transaction shape items; for example, a bundle or set.

AssocSalesTrxnItemShapeId.description: The ID of the associated sales transaction shape item.

AssocSalesTrxnItemShapeRole.description: Describes the position of the associated sales transaction shape item in the relationship.

AssociatedItemShapePricing.description: Describes how the associated sales transaction shape item is priced, relative to the main sales transaction shape item.

MainSalesTrxnItemShapeId.description: The ID of the main sales transaction shape item.

MainSalesTrxnItemShapeRole.description: Indicates the position of the main sales transaction shape item in the relationship.

ProductRelationshipTypeId.description: The ID of the record that describes the relationship between the main and associated sales transaction shape items.

QuantityScaleMethod.description: How to scale the quantity of the associated sales transaction shape item, relative to the main sales transaction shape item. The value is informative; the system doesn’t check whether the scaled quantities are correct. If this field has a non-null value, you can't edit the associated sales transaction shape item’s quantity.

SalesTransactionShapeId.description: The ID of the related sales transaction shape.

SalesTrxnItemRelationShapeName.description: Name of the relationship of the sales transaction shape item.
